sentences.en: As he said this, Hurstwood really imagined that his state was pitiful.
sentences.cn: "当他说这话时, 他真的以为他的处境非常可怜.

sentences.en: But what has brought the company to such a pitiful condition since I last worked for it?
sentences.cn: 自我最后一次为该公司工作以来,什么原因使得公司落到这般可怜的境地?

sentences.en: He decides to wield his pitiful weapon.
sentences.cn: 他决定动用他的可怜的武器了.

sentences.en: He sounded both pitiful and eager to get what he wanted.
sentences.cn: 他听起来既可怜兮兮的，又对想要的东西充满渴望。

sentences.en: It is pitiful to see that the life of an animal in a zoo is spent in an locked iron cage.
sentences.cn: 看到动物园里的动物一生都被关在铁笼子里,真是令人可怜.

sentences.en: It was Mama's pitiful weeping that brought tears to my eyes.
sentences.cn: 我倒是为妈妈哭得可怜而也落了泪.

sentences.en: It was the most pitiful sight I had ever seen.
sentences.cn: 这是我看到过的最令人同情的一幕。

sentences.en: No one could look at such a pitiful sight with dry eyes.
That's the way with you whining , puny, pitiful players.
sentences.cn: 你们这种又爱哭 、 又软弱 、 又可怜的赌棍就是这样.

sentences.en: The choice is pitiful and the quality of some of the products is very low.
sentences.cn: 选择余地极小，而且其中一些产品的质量很差。

sentences.en: The farmers pay pitiful wages, often in the form of food and clothes.
sentences.cn: 农场主支付的报酬少得可怜，还经常是以食物和衣服的形式。

sentences.en: The girl's pitiful history would wring one's withers.
sentences.cn: 这女孩子的经历令人心碎.

sentences.en: The pitiful condition of their workshop became more of hindrance than ever.
sentences.cn: 本来就够凄凉可怜的工作间,比以前更成问题了.

sentences.en: The refugees were a pitiful sight .
The spur of that pitiful sight set her gliding swiftly.
sentences.cn: 这种凄楚的景象使她赶紧跑过去.

sentences.en: These magazines were the most pitiful burlesque stuff that yon could imagine.
sentences.cn: 这些杂志是些拙劣的东西,要多荒唐有多荒唐.

words.tran_cn: 冷酷的，无情的；无同情心的
可怜地，令人怜悯地；可恨地
对……表示怜悯；对……感到同情

trans.tran_cn: 可怜的，可鄙的，<古>充满同情或怜悯的，惨
trans.tran_en: someone who is pitiful looks or sounds so sad and unfortunate that you feel very sorry for them
